Business Details
Edit info for this business Hours: Open 7 Days Categories: Chicken Restaurants, Fast Food Restaurants Neighborhoods: Southeast Springfield General Info
Started in 1946 with a simple idea of making chicken sandwiches, Chick-Fil-A has grown into one of the largest, privately owned restaurant chains in the United States. It has expertise in preparing chicken recipes and uses peanut oil in its cooking processes. The chain s restaurants serve chicken wraps, sandwiches, burritos and nuggets, as well as a variety of salads, hand-spun milkshakes and waffle fries. Recognized as the pioneer in quick-service mall food, Chick-Fil-A operates more than 1,400 restaurants in over 35 U.S. states. With annual sales of nearly $2 billion, the chain employs approximately 50,000 associates. Chick-Fil-A participates in various community-based projects, such as health awareness and scholarship programs. Its Kid's Meal program is designed to help parents with physical and character development of their children. Additionally, the chain s restaurants conduct the Chick-Fil-A Leadership Scholarship Program, which focuses on creating higher education opportunities for employees.

5 stars
Cartertj79 10/15/2011
The best chicken in town
Provided by YPmobile
You need to open more stores over on the west side of spfld, you have the best chicken in the world and I want a store that is closer, PLEASE!

5 stars
allyallyt 11/06/2010
yum yum
this is good eating! clean restaurant. wish it was larger, its always busy here
Was this helpful? Yes No Respond Flag abuse
5 stars
Debbie L. 10/03/2006
Wonderful Chicken
Provided by Judy's Book
You gotta love Chic Fil A. I appreciate the fact that they not only have the fattening, tasty chicken, but they also have the less fattening, but still tasty chicken. They've got terrific waffle fries, for the fry lovers out there. They also have veggie and fruit salads for those who are trying to be health conscious. I also like all of the different sauces. The best thing is that for kids, most of the time they get a book with the kids meal. That is awesome. I would much rather my children come home looking at a book (they're preschoolers and can't read yet:) than playing with some little, cheap plastic toy that will be lost within just a few days.
Was this helpful? Yes No Respond Flag abuse
5 stars
Carl R. 04/13/2006
Love this place
Provided by Judy's Book
This is located inside the Battlefield Mall in the food court. It has been around a long time, and it is no wonder because it is a fabulous fast food restaurant that always has quality food that is so great tasting you will never tire of it. They have a lot of different chicken items on the menu, so you will have plenty of ways to eat your chicken. Great side items and some of the best waffle fries ever! Great sweet tea as well. Always crowded because it is so good.
